reviewText:
Much better quality than the first DVD. Clear,concise and detailed.
I really enjoyed this installment and it gives you some new techniques.
See my previous review for Don's other DVD in this Hooked on Fly Tying series. An excellent learning aid.

This video as others by Don Bastian are very well done. They are easily to follow. Don is an expert on classic wet flies. I took one of his classes in person but videos allow you to review them as often as neede.
